attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever seen/used, and I would never recommend it to anyone. It runs slow and has stupid things on it. Apple should totally remove this app!!!
attributes.title: Slow and Stupid

attributes.review: when i opened the app there was a rat on my screen dang near almost threw my phone across the room this also steals all your info from your phone very un American
attributes.title: never doing this again

attributes.review: oh my god this app had awakened a ghost in my closet and now it haunts all the racist republicans in the area and i can’t get it to stop! this app is absolutely disgusting because Pam hasn’t been bothered by anything, even my cat’s death!! so disappointing
attributes.title: absolutely disgusting

attributes.review: HORRIBLE APP DO NOT DOWNLOAD, this app runs extremely slow and makes my phone glitch like crazy. also asked me for my phone number??? definitely not comfortable giving out my personal information. PHONE WORKED PERFECT AFTER I DELETED
attributes.title: horrifying app

attributes.review: i was the day that we could go back into the house for a little while so i is a time for me haha is next time you get home and we do a little while we are going on a drive thru is the weather for you guys i’m was that. in other words, this app is a complete waste of space, time, energy, and brain capacity so please do yourself and everyone a favor by ridding it’s vile existence along with cheeto puff guy while we’re at it.
attributes.title: yikes

attributes.review: Before I got this my phone was basically brand new and now it glitches and is so slow and my audio stopped working and now I have to get a new phone this app is TRASH
attributes.title: Terrible glitching

attributes.review:
I was a girl in the village doing all right              then I became a princess overnight
Now I gotta figure out how to do it right 
So much to learn and see
Up in the castle with my new family
In a school that's just for royalty
A whole enchanted world is waiting for me
I'm so excited to be (Sofia the First)
I'm finding out what being royal's all about (Sofia the First)
Making my way, it's an adventure every day (Sofia)
It's gonna be my time (Sofia)
To show them all that I'm Sofia the First
attributes.title: Bruh

attributes.review: this app is so bad first it made me blind by the pictures of an orange 🍊 then i when i got my sight back i had to go to target to get bleach to never see again so when i got home i couldn’t see and i am now blind and i can’t even type THANKS A LOt MR TRUMPPPP 🥰🍊😭🤬
attributes.title: HORRIBLE SERVICE DONT DOWLOAD

attributes.review: Don’t get me wrong I LOVE Trump. MAGA!! But this app is the worst. It’s very glitchy and it really drains my battery. And I found out it was spreading FAKE NEWS just like CNN. I think this is a fake Trump app made by the liberals and Obama. President Trump would not support such a terrible app!
attributes.title: Fake Trump app. Please don’t get!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what’s going on in our president’s world but as soon as I open it ICE came to take my abuela to Mexico but she ran like speedy Gonzalez out the door and a car hit her. Get well abuela we are going to miss your tortillas and frijoles. 😔
attributes.title: ✨🧚🏻‍♀️ 𝓝𝓸🧚🏻‍♀️✨
